title: Oz animation: the new wave
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/AIDS (Disease)
abstract: Picture start (3 min. Dir. Jeremy Parker)--Feral television (17 min. Dir. Damien Ledwich)--Nine to five (1 min. Dir. Lindsay Buckland--Once as if a balloon (3 min. Dir. Sabrina Schmid)--Tuxedo moon (9 min. Dir. Lindsay Buckland)--The adventures of the amazing Chuck Bradshaw (1 min. Dir. Jeremy Parker) --Velvet underground: the calling (5 min. Dir. Anthony Partos)--One man's instrument (4 min. Dir. Max Bannah)--Dream (7 min. Dir. Mark Sutherland)--Tiga (9 min. Dir. Lucinda Clutterbuck--La Petite mort (5 min. Dir. Dana Rayson)--Start from scratch (4 min. Dir. Zinoviy Gamarnik)--Reaper madness (7 min. Dir. Nick Donkin--Union Street (14 min. Dir. Wendy Chandler)
description: Considered by some to be the most talented Australian New Wave animators of the late 1980's-early 90's, this back to back compilation showcases many incredible techniques and creative minds by these filmmakers.
